text:
@revrrlewis It’s a hospital where he is visiting Covid19 patients. Give me a break. 
This man, @VP is LEADING the pandemic response. 
No wonder we are in such bad shape. 
He is basically saying that he doesn’t care - a vile slap in the face to all of our courageous healthcare workers.
